description: The JUPITER Benchmark Suite assembles a number of application and synthetic benchmarks with detailed instructions for compilation, execution, and evaluation. It was developed on the JUWELS Booster system at JÃ¼lich Supercomputing Centre, Germany, and used for the procurement of the JUPITER Exascale supercomputer.
notes: This repository accompanies a paper published at SC24, titled 'Application-Driven Exascale: The JUPITER Benchmark Suite'
conference_title: The International Conference for High Performance Computing, Networking, Storage, and Analysis
